fields.description: i am not able to make the build of titanium project from xcode .when i try it says invalid ppuuid .please guide me.
fields.summary: unable to build titanium project from xcode manually.Get error of invalid ppuuid in xcode .
fields.environment: i am using mac os x mavericks and xcode 6.2.with this i am using appcelerator studio and titanium sdk 4.0.

comments.body: [~zeeshansuleman] if you found a bug, please post a test case and steps to reproduce, otherwise, please post your questions in the [community portal| https://community.appcelerator.com ]
